pdgm.pdgmnote: Parker-Hayward1985 p. 257,tab 22. This paradigm gives the form structure, affirmative and negative, for each of the 26 tam forms recognized by Hayward. In the absence of a detailed analysis, an approximate gloss (that of Hayward, in fact) is given for the affirmative forms. As example of each polarity-tam comination we give the 3msg form of the suffixing verb fak- open.

prop.val: he is intending / about to open
he opens / is opening / will open
he was opening / used to open /had been opening
if he had opened / had he opened
he was opening / used to open /had been opening

pdgm.pdgmnote: Parker-Hayward1985 pp. 274 - 279:table za z zc zd
